com.ltsllc.miranda.node.states

Class NewNodeState

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.ltsllc.miranda.State
      • com.ltsllc.miranda.node.states.NodeState
        • com.ltsllc.miranda.node.states.NewNodeState

  • public class NewNodeState
extends NodeState
    When a node is added via a connect it enters this state, waiting for a join message.

      • processMessage

        public State processMessage(Message message)
                     throws MirandaException
        Description copied from class: State
        Process the next message and return the next state.

        The default implementation logs a warning and returns this.

        Overrides:

        Returns:
